briefdescription.para: The type of the field stored in the array.

detaileddescription.para: This is a DDC keyword used to make this class interchangeable with Field. In DDC FieldMem types are referred to as Chunk types and Field types are referred to as ChunkSpan/ChunkView.

detaileddescription.para: This is a DDC keyword used to make this class interchangeable with Field. In DDC Idx types are referred to as DiscreteElement types.

memberdef.definition: constexpr int DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::n_fields
memberdef.name: n_fields

briefdescription.para: The number of fields which must be created to describe this object.

memberdef.definition: friend class DerivFieldMem
memberdef.name: DerivFieldMem

memberdef.definition: friend class DerivField
memberdef.name: DerivField

memberdef.definition: std::array<internal_mdspan_type, n_fields> DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::internal_fields
memberdef.name: internal_fields

briefdescription.para: The internal fields describing the values and derivatives.

detaileddescription.para: The fields which contain the values have different index ranges to the fields containing derivatives so a DDC object cannot be used directly. E.g. for a 2D field (X,Y) with derivatives provided in both directions the elements of internal_fields have the type : DFieldMem<IdxRange<Deriv<X>, Deriv<Y>, GridX, GridY>> The derivative index ranges are then defined such that the elements of internal_fields represent: 0 : $f(x,y)$ 1 : $\partial_x^k f(x,y) \quad \forall 1 \leq k \leq NDerivs$ 2 : $\partial_y^k f(x,y) \quad \forall 1 \leq k \leq NDerivs$ 3 : $\partial_x^j \partial_y^k f(x,y) \quad \forall 1 \leq j \leq NDerivs, \forall 1 \leq k \leq NDerivs$

memberdef.definition: physical_idx_range_type DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::m_physical_idx_range
memberdef.name: m_physical_idx_range

briefdescription.para: The physical index range on which the values are defined.

memberdef.definition: discrete_deriv_idx_range_type DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::m_deriv_idx_range
memberdef.name: m_deriv_idx_range

briefdescription.para: The index range of available derivatives.

memberdef.definition: to_subidx_range_collection<physical_deriv_grids> DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::m_cross_derivative_idx_range
memberdef.name: m_cross_derivative_idx_range

briefdescription.para: The physical index ranges on which the derivatives are defined.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION std::size_t DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::get_index
memberdef.name: get_index

briefdescription.para: Get the index of the Idx within m_cross_derivative_idx_range. This function is particularly useful to index an mdspan over an index range slice.

parameterdescription.para: A 1D Idx which is inside the index range slice.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION int DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::get_array_index
memberdef.name: get_array_index

briefdescription.para: An internal function which provides the index of a field inside the internal_fields array. An Idx describes the derivatives of interest. n-th order derivatives are stored in the same field for all n!=0 so it is sufficient to provide any valid element from the derivatives.

detaileddescription.para: The index is calculated using a bit mask. Mathematically the equation which determines the index in internal_fields is: $ \sum_{\xi} 2^{i_\xi} \delta_{\text{using derivs in }\xi} $ where $i_\xi$ is the index of the dimension $\xi$ in the tags.

parameterdescription.para: The derivatives of interest.

simplesect.para: int The index of the internal field inside the array internal_fields.
discrete_deriv_idx_range_type The index range of the derivatives at the field at the index.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION constexpr auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::get_slicer_for
memberdef.name: get_slicer_for

briefdescription.para: Get an object which can be used to slice an mdspan.

parameterdescription.para: The DDC element which should be used to slice the field.
The index of the mdspan in internal_fields that will be sliced.
The dimension along which we want to slice.

simplesect.para: An index or a slice which can be used to slice an mdspan.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION constexpr auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::get_slicer_for
memberdef.name: get_slicer_for

briefdescription.para: Get an object which can be used to slice an mdspan.

parameterdescription.para: The DDC index range which should be used to slice the field.
The index of the mdspan in internal_fields that will be sliced.
The dimension along which the we want to slice.

simplesect.para: A slice (often in the form of a (start, end) pair) which can be used to slice an mdspan.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::get_internal_field
memberdef.name: get_internal_field

detaileddescription.para: Get a Field from a subset of one of the mdspans in internal_fields. The provided IdxRange is used to slice the mdspan in such a way that the resulting mdspan can be saved in a Field. This means that all information about derivatives must be provided. If information about a derivative is missing then it is assumed that the 0-th order derivative is requested.

parameterdescription.para: The index range used to slice the mdspan.

simplesect.para: Field The subset of the internal mdspan.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::get_internal_field
memberdef.name: get_internal_field

detaileddescription.para: Get a Field from a subset of one of the mdspans in internal_fields. The provided Idx is used to slice the mdspan in such a way that the resulting mdspan can be saved in a Field. This means that all information about derivatives must be provided. If information about a derivative is missing then it is assumed that the 0-th order derivative is requested.

parameterdescription.para: The element used to slice the mdspan.

simplesect.para: Field The subset of the internal mdspan.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::DerivFieldCommon
memberdef.argsstring: (physical_idx_range_type physical_idx_range, discrete_deriv_idx_range_type deriv_idx_range, to_subidx_range_collection< physical_deriv_grids > cross_derivative_idx_range)
memberdef.name: DerivFieldCommon

briefdescription.para: Protected constructor to be used by subclasses to initialise index ranges.

parameterdescription.para: The index range on which the values of the function are defined.
The index range of the provided derivatives.
The cross product of the index ranges on which the derivatives of the function are defined.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_DEFAULTED_FUNCTION DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::~DerivFieldCommon
memberdef.name: ~DerivFieldCommon

memberdef.definition: constexpr auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::operator[]
memberdef.name: operator[]

briefdescription.para: Get a ConstField describing a subset of the data.

parameterdescription.para: A discrete element describing the position at which these dimensions should be indexed. If information about the derivatives is missing then it is assumed that the 0-th order derivative is requested.

simplesect.para: ConstField A subset of the data.

memberdef.definition: constexpr auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::operator[]
memberdef.name: operator[]

briefdescription.para: Get a Field describing a subset of the data.

parameterdescription.para: A discrete element describing the position at which these dimensions should be indexed. If information about the derivatives is missing then it is assumed that the 0-th order derivative is requested.

simplesect.para: Field A subset of the data.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION constexpr auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::operator[]
memberdef.name: operator[]

briefdescription.para: Get a Field describing a subset of the data. This function allows a slice to be obtained however it is designed to return a Field. It is therefore not possible to request data from multiple fields (e.g. derivatives from 0 to 3).

parameterdescription.para: A discrete index range describing the position at which these dimensions should be indexed. If information about the derivatives is missing then it is assumed that the 0-th order derivative is requested.

simplesect.para: Field A subset of the data.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION constexpr auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::operator[]
memberdef.name: operator[]

briefdescription.para: Get a ConstField describing a subset of the data. This function allows a slice to be obtained however it is designed to return a ConstField. It is therefore not possible to request data from multiple fields (e.g. derivatives from 0 to 3).

parameterdescription.para: A discrete index range describing the position at which these dimensions should be indexed. If information about the derivatives is missing then it is assumed that the 0-th order derivative is requested.

simplesect.para: ConstField A subset of the data.

memberdef.definition: auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::get_mdspan
memberdef.name: get_mdspan

briefdescription.para: Get one of the mdspans from the internal array internal_fields. This function takes index ranges on the derivative directions. Where derivatives are missing it is assumed that the 0-th order derivative is requested. This dimension is stripped from the resulting field. This is the recommended way to access the internal fields.

parameterdescription.para: The derivative index range which should be retained.

simplesect.para: Field The field on the physical index range and the requested index ranges.

memberdef.definition: auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::get_mdspan
memberdef.name: get_mdspan

briefdescription.para: Get the mdspan holding the values of the function from the internal array internal_fields.

simplesect.para: Field The field on the physical index range and the requested index ranges.

memberdef.definition: auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::get_values_field
memberdef.name: get_values_field

briefdescription.para: Get the Field which holds the values of the function.

detaileddescription.para: This function is equivalent to calling operator[] with a 0D IdxRange.

simplesect.para: Field The field on the physical index range.

memberdef.definition: auto DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::get_values_const_field
memberdef.name: get_values_const_field

briefdescription.para: Get the Field which holds the values of the function.

detaileddescription.para: This function is equivalent to calling operator[] with a 0D IdxRange.

simplesect.para: Field The constant field on the physical index range.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION physical_idx_range_type DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::idx_range
memberdef.name: idx_range

briefdescription.para: Get the physical index range on which the Field is defined. This method is equivalent to calling get_idx_range(this->get_values_field())

memberdef.definition: discrete_deriv_idx_range_type DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::derivative_idx_range
memberdef.name: derivative_idx_range

briefdescription.para: Get the index ranges describing which derivatives are defined for each dimension.

detaileddescription.para: E.g. for a DerivFieldMem<double, IdxRange<ddc::Deriv<X>, GridX, GridY>, 2> This will return IdxRange<ddc::Deriv<X>>(1,2) indicating that the first and second derivatives are defined for the X dimension. E.g. for a DerivField<double, IdxRange<ddc::Deriv<X>, ddc::Deriv<Y>, GridX, GridY>> This will return IdxRange<ddc::Deriv<X>, ddc::Deriv<Y>> indicating how many of the X and Y derivatives are saved in this field (this may be a subset of the derivatives available in the originally allocated DerivFieldMem.

memberdef.definition: IdxRangeSlice< Grid1D > DerivFieldCommon< FieldType, IdxRange< DDims... > >::idx_range_for_deriv
memberdef.name: idx_range_for_deriv

briefdescription.para: Get the physical index range along Grid1D on which the derivatives of that dimension are defined.

detaileddescription.para: This is equivalent to retrieving the argument deriv_idx_range_x from a dxField defined as: DerivFieldMem<double, IdxRange<dX, GridX, GridY>, 1> dxField(idx_range_x_y, deriv_idx_range_x);

briefdescription.para: An abstract class which holds a chunk of memory describing a field and its derivatives. This is the superclass for DerivFieldMem and DerivField.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the object stored in the internal_fields array.

The index range on which the internal fields are defined. This index range is the physical index range on which the values are defined combined with the index range of the derivatives of interest (e.g. IdxRange<Deriv<IDimX>, IDimX, IDimY>).
